feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Identity Management
feed.subtitle: SAP Identity Management Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: User deactivate via IPS
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We provision users from Azure -> IAS -> Enable Now using IPS.

If a user for example:  test1) is removed/deleted from the group in Azure/ IAS, and an IPS Job runs afterward, the user (test1) is not deleted in Enable Now; only their roles are removed. However, the user remains "Active" in Enable Now.

Can the user in Enable Now be deactivated (i.e., the "Active" checkbox removed) through the IPS Job if the user is deleted/removed from the Azure/IAS group?

Or is there a way to automatically deactivate the user in Enable Now instead of directly deleting them?

 Does anyone have an idea ?

Many Thanks

Best Regards

entry.title: SAP IDM: check field value before submit a form
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a form in IDM for the user management of an SAP system, in this form we have the manager of the user and the value of approval of the user.

I would like to check during the backup in order to verify that the approval value is lower than that of its manager.

I have seen the Extension Framework but it seems to me quite complex to set up.

Do you have a solution to help me?

Regards,

Michael RIANT

entry.title: BTP Trial IAS Provisioning Issue
entry.content: “My BTP trial global account ID is 58dc44e9trial in us10. Identity Authentication token URL exists, but the admin UI and SAML metadata both return errors (Uh oh, 404). I'm unable to establish trust to subscribe to SAP Build Work Zone. Please advise.”

entry.title: Modifying user license from IPS
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am provisioning users from IPS to AS ABAP and it works great. Now I have the requirement to add user license type based on groups in local identity.

Before the change everyting works as expected but after adding the payload bellow I am getting the error:

IDENTITY_MODIFY function returned response number 279 and errors: Enter a user name. ,

The payload added to the call from IPS to AS ABAP.

{"UCLASS":[{"LIC_TYPE":"HB"}],"UCLASSX":{"UCLASS":"X","UCLASSSYS":"R"}

I found this post https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/provisioning-license-type-to-abap-target-systems/qaq-p/6708235 but can't find the response mentioned in the answer above.

entry.title: IAS/IPS – Efficient Group Setup?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

We are using SAP IAS/IPS with Azure as Idp. We have already connected several SAP Cloud Apps to IAS, and more apps will be added.

Access to these apps is controlled by groups in Azure. For example, depending on a user’s role in SAC or Enable Now, different groups are created in Azure.

In SAC, we already have at least 10 groups, and in Enable Now even more. As more SAP Cloud Apps are connected, the number of Azure groups increases quickly.

My question is:
Is there a better or easier way to manage roles and access without creating so many groups in Azure?

How do you manage this in your environment to keep it organized and scalable?

Thanks for your help

Best regards

entry.title: Login Name for Manual IAS Users
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

We are provisioning users from Azure AD → SAP IAS → SAP Enable Now using IPS.


There are two types of users in our setup:

Internal users from Azure AD:
We map the employeeId from Azure to the Login Name field in IAS, which is then used as the userName in SAP Enable Now employeeid(Azure)->LoginName(IAS)->User Name(Enable Now)

External users created manually in IAS:
These users do not have a Login Name and the userName in Enable Now is a required field and provisioning fails.

Is there a way to automatically populate the Login Name field in IAS when creating users manually?
Have you implemented a similar solution or do you have any ideas or best practices for this scenario?

Thanks in advance for your help

Best regards

entry.title: how to provision assignments with validity date from SAP IPS to AS ABAP system
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Has anyone been able to provision users to AS ABAP SAP System from IPS where the AS ABAP system is configured as an target or else as proxy system. what should be maintained in the transformation so that the connector can provision? 

I am guessing this is the Function Module which we will be using ips connector uses to provision user assignments BAPI_USER_ACTGROUPS_ASSIGN.

I see this function module accepts validity dates for role assignments? but how to pass this in the write transformation logic?

currently in write transformation of proxy system below is the logic. As per my understanding for each role the user would be assigned? then how can be pass the validity dates for each role assignment? does the IPS support that?

{
        "sourcePath": "$.members[*].value",
        "preserveArrayWithSingleElement": true,
        "targetPath": "$.USERLIST[?(@.USERNAME)]",
        "optional": true,
        "functions": [
          {
            "type": "decode",
            "algorithm": "base32",
            "skipPadding": true
          },
          {
            "type": "toString",
            "applyOnElements": true
          }
        ]
      }

 



/Deva

entry.title: How to refresh/update MX_DISABLED attribute in the IDM UI after reactivated an ID
entry.content:
Hi

my question:  i had in IDM,  updated the ID from a task and reactivated it. (MX_DISABLED=0) everything is ok in the DB and in all back-end the id is recativated but in the IDM UI its still check  

I search but id didnt  find where  i can update/refresh  the java side IDM ui  and how ?

entry.content:

I have been trying to assign few roles to users from IdM to HANA repositories but received error stating that The provided input is not valid design time role.  I can assign the role manually in HANA system.

Could you please check and help me out.

 

Thank you!!

entry.title: IAS- Notification for Migrated users from External Sites - Learning only-user
entry.content: Hi I would like to ask: if email notifications are enabled in IAS, when the ReadJob is executed for the users migrated from Learning, will they receive a notification to activate their accounts?

entry.title: create 2 source system in IAS: SF for user provisioning and ENTRA for Group Provisioning
entry.content:
Dear All,
I am seeking assistance with combining multiple sources to a single target, IAS, using automated triggers. Users will be imported from SuccessFactors, and groups will be created and provisioned from ENTRA. However, upon investigation, I have found that the assignment of these groups to users in IAS is not occurring.

Specifically, the groups are being created, but the users are not being assigned to them in IAS. I am curious to know if anyone has encountered this issue before and has any guidance on resolving it.

Best regards,

entry.title: SAP IDM: Digit change on EntryId causes selection of further data
entry.content:
Dear Gurus,

I have a question regarding the SAP IDM Url, why is it possible to see the other entries by changing the digits on the EntryId in the browser, is there a possiblity to mask the EntryId? 

Below is the output of my browser when I am logged in as Admin User in our SAP IDM and looked for a colleague to change his values. 

http://localhost:50000/webdynpro/dispatcher/sap.com/tc~idm~wd~workflow/EditTask?TaskId=1643&EntryId=43408# 

The out put of the Values are Mr. X with the company details etc. 

But when I change the last digits of the above url to 9 instead of 8,  I am able to see the other entries. 

http://localhost:50000/webdynpro/dispatcher/sap.com/tc~idm~wd~workflow/EditTask?TaskId=1643&EntryId=43409# 

For a IDM Admin shouldn't be the problem but for other normal users should be limited. Is there a possiblity to limit the view or the access to avoid these kind of view? 

Looking forward to hear from you

entry.title: Business event definition error for MCP task
entry.content:

when providing the 'agent of control performance' in the 'requested end' tab of MCP task , there is a binding error as attached. However, when the binding is changed to agent of escalation, there is no binding error.

But the reminder(requested end') should be sent to agent of control performance. please guide as how to

 

 BR, plaban

entry.content: We need to now set up MITIGATION CONTROLS for open SODs — meanwhile the business and audit want to see underlying actions and permissions mapped with each Risk Id . How do I provide that information ?

entry.title: How to check SOD for Digital Manufacturing?
entry.content:
We do not have IAG Bridge to connect to SAP GRC. Is there any other way to Implement SOD checks for SAP Digital Manufacturing ? 

Any recommedations and tools ?

entry.title: How can I replicate the passwords defined in SAP IAS to my destination system
entry.content:
I'm using IAS as the source and S4HANA on-premise as the target, and I've already implemented user replication.

However, I'm having a problem. I want to use the same password that each user has defined in SAP IAS so they can log into the S4HANA system, but I haven't been able to. The only thing I see in the transformations default code indicates that a random password is created with certain requirements, such as character count, uppercase and lowercase letters, etc.

 

Does anyone know if this is possible?

If it is, could you guide me on the configuration I should change?

entry.title: SAP Auth and Security Project work / Implementation
entry.content:
Hi Security Team,

I’ve been working as an SAP Authorizations & Security Consultant for the past nine years, primarily supporting ECC environments and managing day-to-day user access operations. I’m now looking to broaden my expertise beyond BAU activities and deepen my knowledge in areas such as:

  • SAP GRC implementation

  • Rule set design and optimization

  • SAP role-build methodologies and best-practice frameworks

  • Overall project-based security design and governance

If anyone could recommend tools, materials, frameworks, or learning paths that would help strengthen my understanding of these project-focused areas, I would really appreciate it.

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: IAS User Mail
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

some of my users are provisioned from Azure → IAS, while others are created locally in IAS.

What options are available to send activation/verification emails to both types of users (no mail server is configured)?

Many Thanks

Best Regards

Rajesh PS

entry.title: Error: While connecting from SAP BTP Integration Suite to SAP S4 Cloud Odata
entry.content:
Hello Team,

 

I'm getting below error while connecting from SAP BTP Integration Suite Cloud to SAP S4 Cloud Odata service.

"com.sap.gateway.core.ip.component.odata.exception.OsciException: HTTP Request failed with error : <HOST>: No address associated with hostname, cause: java.net.UnknownHostException: <HOST>: No address associated with hostname"

 

 

 

Thanks and Regards,

Rajesh PS
